title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 136 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 136 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 你们要称谢耶和华，因他本为善。他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: O give thanks unto the God of gods: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 你们要称谢万神之神，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: O give thanks to the Lord of lords: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 你们要称谢万主之主，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: To him who alone doeth great wonders: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 称谢那独行大奇事的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: To him that by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 称谢那用智慧造天的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: To him that stretched out the earth above the waters: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 称谢那铺地在水以上的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: To him that made great lights: for his mercy endureth for ever:
lineList.cn: 称谢那造成大光的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: The sun to rule by day: for his mercy endureth for ever:
lineList.cn: 他造日头管白昼，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: The moon and stars to rule by night: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 他造月亮星宿管黑夜，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: To him that smote Egypt in their firstborn: for his mercy endureth for ever:
lineList.cn: 称谢那击杀埃及人之长子的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: And brought out Israel from among them: for his mercy endureth for ever:
lineList.cn: 他领以色列人从他们中间出来，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: With a strong hand, and with a stretched out arm: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 他施展大能的手和伸出来的膀臂，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: To him which divided the Red sea into parts: for his mercy endureth for ever:
lineList.cn: 称谢那分裂红海的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: And made Israel to pass through the midst of it: for his mercy endureth for ever:
lineList.cn: 他领以色列从其中经过，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: But overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red sea: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 却把法老和他的军兵推翻在红海里，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: To him which led his people through the wilderness: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 称谢那引导自己的民行走旷野的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: To him which smote great kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:
lineList.cn: 称谢那击杀大君王的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: And slew famous kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:
lineList.cn: 他杀戮有名的君王，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: Sihon king of the Amorites: for his mercy endureth for ever:
lineList.cn: 就是杀戮亚摩利王西宏，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: And Og the king of Bashan: for his mercy endureth for ever:
lineList.cn: 又杀巴珊王噩，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: And gave their land for an heritage: for his mercy endureth for ever:
lineList.cn: 他将他们的地赐他的百姓为业，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: Even an heritage unto Israel his servant: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 就是赐他的仆人以色列为业，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: Who remembered us in our low estate: for his mercy endureth for ever:
lineList.cn: 他顾念我们在卑微的地步，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: And hath redeemed us from our enemies: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 他救拔我们脱离敌人，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: Who giveth food to all flesh: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 他赐粮食给凡有血气的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: O give thanks unto the God of heaven: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 你们要称谢天上的神，因他的慈爱永远长存。
